title: Angel Video Converter v1.6 (multi-Language)
description:
Angel Video Converter is the choice for all-in-one video and audio conversion program. It supports most of video formats including H264(MPEG-4 AVC),VCD,AVI,WMV,MP4,MOV,3GP,3G2,ASF and audio file formats like MP2,MP3,WMA,AAC,M4A,WAV,AC3 and more. It can also extract music from video media and vice versa.
Angel Video Converter supports all of the popular multimedia devices including PSP, iPod, Apple TV, MP4 player, XBOX, PS3, Zune and mobile phones. Select the multimedia files, the intended devices or formats, and hit "Encode" to convert multimedia files to the right format for your intended devices.
 
For advanced users, you can just answer a few easy to follow questions to convert your media files to the exact specifications.
